name: Sightless (AbsurdWaffle)
description:
Several people you love have fallen to the darkness. Purify their sorrows with the holy light to save as many as you can!

Created during Brackeys Game Jam #2

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Throw Arrow: Left Click

Slash Attack: Space Bar

Interact: E
